about_the_game:
InFocus is a highly realistic multiplayer first-person shooter, developed by a team of enthusiasts and powered by cutting-edge Unreal Engine 5 technology. The game aims to revolutionize the genre with exclusive features and a brand-new immersive experience.

Thanks to the capabilities of Unreal Engine 5, InFocus promises a next-generation gaming experience, highlighting the future of realistic video games. Beyond its impressive graphics and fully immersive sound, the game stands out with innovative gameplay mechanics. These unique features, soon to be revealed to the public, will push the boundaries of first-person shooters by offering unparalleled interaction and fluid movement.

Get ready to engage in thrilling battles alongside your teammates, where strategy and the smart use of your gear will be key to victory. The richly detailed environments provide total immersion, allowing for more advanced tactical development than ever before. InFocus also introduces new modes, soon to be unveiled, specifically designed for competitive play. Cooperation and communication with your team will be crucial to emerge victorious in every encounter!

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains shooting and killing events of other players as it involves gunfights in order to progress in the game.
